games.summary: CHARLOTTE, N.C. -- —Josh Giddeyhad 26 points, 11 assists and seven rebounds,Zach Collinsadded 16 points off the bench and theChicago Bullserased a 13-point, second-half deficit to beat theCharlotte Hornets129-126 on Friday night and snap a seven-game losing streak.
blurbs: 📋 KJ Simpson (CHA) made just his 2nd start this season. 10 pts, 5 reb.

games.summary: DETROIT -- —Isaiah Stewartscored 17 points to lead a balanced scoring attack as theDetroit Pistonsbeat theAtlanta Hawks142-115 on Friday night. Jalen Johnsonrecorded his third straight triple-double, finishing with 19 points, 11 rebounds and 11 assists.

PHILADELPHIA -- —Joel Embiidscored a season-high 39 points,Paul Georgehad 23 and thePhiladelphia 76ersbeat theIndiana Pacers115-105 on Friday night. VJ Edgecombeadded 22 points for the 76ers, who played withoutTyrese Maxey— the NBA’s third-leading scorer (31.5 points per game) sat out with an illness.
blurbs: 📋 Quentin Grimes (PHI) made just his 5th start this season. 10 pts, 9 reb.

games.summary: WASHINGTON -- —Donovan Mitchellscored 24 of his 48 points in the fourth quarter, leading theCleveland Cavaliersback from a 15-point deficit in the final period to a 130-126 victory over theWashington Wizardson Friday night. Bub CarringtonandCJ McCollumscored 27 points apiece for Washington, andJamir Watkinsadded a career-high 15.
blurbs: ⬆️ Marvin Bagley III (WSH) played 33 min (season avg: 18). 15 pts, 13 reb, 4 ast.
⬆️ Bub Carrington (WSH) played 41 min (season avg: 26). 27 pts, 6 reb, 8 ast.
⬆️ Will Riley (WSH) played 23 min (season avg: 10). 7 pts, 3 reb, 4 ast.

games.summary: MEMPHIS, Tenn. -- —Keyonte Georgescored a career-high 39 points, including the final six points for Utah, as the Jazz beat Memphis 130-126 on Friday night inJa Morant's return to the Grizzlies' lineup.
blurbs: 📋 Santi Aldama (MEM) made just his 3rd start this season. 22 pts, 7 reb.

games.summary: DALLAS -- —Anthony Davisscored 20 of his 24 points in the second half to go with 14 rebounds and three blocks, andCooper Flagghad 22 points and eight assists as theDallas Mavericksrallied to beat theBrooklyn Nets119-111 on Friday night. Porter has scored at least 30 points in four consecutive games for the first time in his seven-year NBA career.

SAN FRANCISCO -- —Rudy Goberthad 24 points and 14 rebounds,Donte DiVincenzomade a clutch 3-pointer with 28 seconds remaining and theMinnesota Timberwolvesbeat theGolden State Warriors127-120 on Friday night. Quinten Postscored 16 points for Golden State.
blurbs: ⬆️ Quinten Post (GS) played 33 min (season avg: 18). 16 pts, 6 reb, 3 ast.
📋 Buddy Hield (GS) made just his 3rd start this season. 6 pts, 2 reb.
📋 Pat Spencer (GS) made just his 3rd start this season. 12 pts, 5 reb.
🆕 Bones Hyland (MIN) made his first start of the season. 5 min, 3 pts.
⬆️ Terrence Shannon Jr. (MIN) played 30 min (season avg: 13). 9 pts, 4 reb, 3 ast.
